DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to build a model for the prediction of adverse perinatal outcome for preeclampsia in china
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Adverse Perinatal Outcome for Preeclampsia in Sichuan Province of China
DOC.criteria: admitted with preeclampsia or had developed preeclampsia after admission admitted in spontaneous labour or had achieved any component of the maternal outcome before either fulfilling eligibility criteria or collection of predictor data
